channel.title: 508 2 bulby questions
channel.description:
hey all
1) i wanne know how to change the when click skill like when i click on fishing i can change the coords to the fishing guild
2) where can i change the shops npc's from shopkeeper to pirate ore somthing

item.title: 508 2 bulby questions
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. As quvin said, check out ActionButtons.java and search for ‘fishing’
  2. First you need to check NPCOption1.java and find the shop NPC id you want to change. Once you do, replace it with the pirate ID. Then, goto Bin -> Data -> Npc -> NPCSpawn.cfg and find the OLD npc ID, and replace it with the new one.

Read full topic

item.description:

  1. i just know that you change that in “actionbuttons.java”

  2. i dunno XD
